value.name: Center of Weight X
value.info: The X coordinate for center of mass for the object

value.name: Center of Weight Y
value.info: The Y coordinate for center of mass for the object

value.name: Center of Weight Z
value.info: The Z coordinate for center of mass for the object

value.name: Gravity Multiplier
value.info: Value multiplied by level gravity to effect this vehicle. (Default is 1.0)

value.name: Hover Strength
value.info: The anti-gravity force of this wheel point

value.name: Hover Height
value.info: The default height this wheel point hovers

value.name: Wheel
value.info: Value of the wheel which powers this part

value.name: Wheel (?)
value.info: Something to do with the wheels

value.name: Relative Weight
value.info: Some constant decimal portion defining this parts weight compared to the overall

value.name: Position X
value.info: The X coordinate for this part

value.name: Position Y
value.info: The Y coordinate for this part

value.name: Position Z
value.info: The Z coordinate for this part
